page.description: The COMPILE_LIBRARY() function compiles selected libraries into an executable .AEX file. Compile one or more libraries in a CRLF separated list from .ALB to .AEX, lib created is lib_num 0-255, if optional smart flag is set to TRUE than compiles will occur only if needed, ddfilter is an optional expression to only put elements that match filter in the AEX.
page.syntax: L COMPILE_LIBRARY(C libraries[,N lib_id[,L smart[,C ddFilter]]])

argument.name: libraries
argument.description: A CR-LF delimited list of library files (.ALB extensions).

argument.name: smart
argument.description: Logical. Specifies whether to compile only new files, .T. = compile files only if they are new (changed), .F. = compile all files

argument.name: ddFilter
argument.description: Optional. Default = .T. . An expression that selects scripts to compile.
